name: Weng Santos
text: Naisip ko nga, baka nanglalaban na talaga yung mga tao.  Baka ako din manglaban kung alam ko na isa-summary execution ako ng mga yan.

source_obj.text: Naisip ko nga, baka nanglalaban na talaga yung mga tao.  Baka ako din manglaban kung alam ko na isa-summary execution ako ng mga yan.

replies.text: I'm thinking a panic room with lines to internet and phone to contact the media might be more useful than having a gun these days but what can you do if they drive up to your car window in traffic and shoot you?      :(    What a fucked up reality in which these are serious discussions and not fiction.

It is also a f*d up reality when you read about a 5 month old baby (who most likely is unable to walk) getting shot because his dad supposedly fought back. The baby was probably lying down.    I begin to wonder where the Philippine collective soul went --   where our empathy and hearts have gone. When did we start being like this?

Because Art  Abon  mentioned the term "collecfive soul":    Give me a word. Give me a sign. Show me where to look. Tell me what will I find... Heaven let your light shine down.     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=syFwl1MAAY8
